titles.title: There's A Feeling In The Air That God Is Everywhere

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
There's a feeling in the air that God is everywhere,
And His resurrection power is moving in this hour,
That Jesus may be glorified. (2x.)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I come to glorify the name of the Lord.
I come to glorify His name,
For His resurrection power is moving in this hour,
That Jesus may be glorified. (2x.)
